description:
I see from the comments on my last couple of posts, that people are unclear about #falseflags , fear-mongering /  fear p0rn.  Unlike msm or some of the sensational videos on YouTube, I have nothing to gain.  I dont want people to panic , I want them to prepare . .
.
A vaccine is not going to save us and I don't want to be a guinea pig when one becomes available... 😷 don't touch your face , don't touch surfaces out in public , wear gloves , wash your hands frequently , practice #socialdistancing  and boost your body's natural immunity ... .
.
I believe that #covid19 was 100% cooked up in a lab,  whether it was the #BSL4 facility in Canada , then smuggled to the BSL4 in Wuhan ... Whether it was an accidental release or an intentional release ... doesn't really matter to how I decide to prepare for it ... .
.
I'm still stocked up on Elderberry for cold and flu symptoms ... #oiloforegano for respiratory health (pnuemonia) and turmeric for inflammation. Extra food , water , supplies for prolonged isolation . The threat of a snow storm is enough to empty supermarket shelves ... prepare accordingly ... .
.
#Coronavirus WILL be used (similarly to 9/11 and #PatriotAct ) to push policies politicians (or shadow govt) has only dreamed of... there could be #cashconfiscation under the guise of having to sanitize the money to prevent the spread of the virus ,  quarantine is justification for #martiallaw to restrict movement , they are going to #controlthenarrative ... all of the info released to public has to go through the office of Mike Pence ... so the  censorship has already started in America.
.
.
They will blame the #stockmarketcrash on the virus when in actuality the stock market has been on life support for years QE1 , QE2 , QE3 , #Stockrepurchase #sharebuybacks #Repoloans #everythingbubble .
.
If #GeorgiaGuidestones are to be believed ""they"" want population at 500,000,000 . (I knew that long before I'd heard about #event201 #billgatesisevil and his father was involved in early days of planned parenthood) ... .
.
#DavidIcke is ""out there"" but he is a #dotconnector even if he is a bit late to the party.  I like #PeakProsperity videos on YouTube , very informative.
